chapter_reflection.speaker: Narrator
chapter_reflection.text: As the evening winds down, you find yourself reflecting on how much has changed since Lily first walked through your door.

lily_regular.speaker: Narrator
lily_regular.text: She's become a regular presence in the cafe now - not as a critic, but as a friend. Sometimes she cooks, sometimes she simply enjoys the atmosphere. Her notebook has been replaced by conversations.

lily_goodbye_temp.speaker: Lily
lily_goodbye_temp.text: *Lily approaches as she prepares to leave for the evening* I've been thinking. It's time I faced my past. I'm going back to the capital - not to work in that restaurant, but to visit.

lily_purpose.speaker: Lily
lily_purpose.text: I need to apologize to the head chef. Not for the mistake, but for running. For not trusting that he might have understood. For letting fear control me for so long.

player_farewell.speaker: Narrator
player_farewell.text: You wish Lily well on her journey.

choices.text: You'll always have a place in this kitchen, Lily.
Bring back some capital recipes to share!

lily_touched.speaker: Lily
lily_touched.text: *Her eyes glisten* I know. That's what gives me the courage to go. I have somewhere to return to - a kitchen where imperfection is just another ingredient.

lily_promise_return.speaker: Lily
lily_promise_return.text: *She laughs* Only if I can deliberately alter them first. We can't have anything too perfect in Dragon Haven, can we?

chapter_complete.speaker: Narrator
chapter_complete.text: Lily embraces you briefly, then steps out into the evening. Your dragon chirps a farewell, and you swear you see her wipe her eyes before she waves goodbye.

reputation_boost.speaker: Narrator
reputation_boost.text: Word of Lily's transformation - and the cafe that inspired it - begins to spread. Your reputation grows, and whispers of Dragon Haven Cafe reach new ears...
